### getExplicitSectionGlobal() {#ad5d93004504bd6d5129dbcbb758e5a28}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSection &#42; AMDGPUTargetObjectFile::getExplicitSectionGlobal (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42; GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> Kind, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Targets should implement this method to assign a section to globals with an explicit section specfied.

The implementation of this method can assume that GO-&gt;hasSection() is true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetobjectfile-h/#l00026">26</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetobjectfile-h">AMDGPUTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00029">29</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetobjectfile-cpp">AMDGPUTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.
